Crafted with the finest leather upholstery fabric, these stools are perfect for adding a touch of luxury to your home decor. The sleek design and comfortable seat make them perfect for both modern and traditional bars.   The stools are made by IPE Cavalli Group, a trusted name in the furniture industry. They are ideal for those who want to add a touch of sophistication to their home. The bar stools are easy to clean and maintain, making them a practical choice for any home. Get ready to impress your guests with these beautiful bar stools that are sure to be a conversation starter.   These bar stools retail for over £3000 each stool. So in total £9000 of bar stools, grab a bargain!   Size:100cm Overall height x 48cm W x 45cm D x 68cm seat height   Amount:3   Condition:very good, some signs of wear, view images

title: Solid White Oak Waterfall Design Coffee Table Nest Of 2 In Excellent Condition
description: Introducing a stunning solid oak coffee table with a contemporary waterfall design. This exquisite piece boasts a sleek square shape, measuring 61cm in depth and 61cm width, and a height of 59cm. Crafted from high-quality white Oak coffee table is perfect for indoor use in your living room.  I have been informed this is a Muji design.  Assembly is not required for this exceptional item. The tabletop is made of premium white Oak, providing durability and longevity. This coffee table is perfect for those seeking a stylish contemporary and practical addition to their living space.
